summary: Snake Battle Axe! With snake sound and poisonous magic effect!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00df00][size=4]Mod is no longer maintained[/size][/color][/center]

[center][img]http://i31.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0212/3a/40ee368cf487def4fa7eb4baf713ce3a.png[/img]

[size=5]Big and mighty battle axe decorated with a snake and enchanted to envenom enemies with a deadly snake poison![/size]

[youtube]WRY_X6oxY6w[/youtube]
[/center]
[img]http://i32.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0212/46/5d1b3681cc3cf69e5a37737b9bb1de46.png[/img]
[size=3]
* Standalone weapon
* Craftable and tamperable
* Crafted using deadly poison and poisoner skill so has an instant and very strong Poison magic effect (with appropriate visuals)
* Snake hiss sound when drawn
[/size]

[img]http://i31.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0212/94/43516502b39754965f829e06ef251c94.png[/img]

1. Use NMM for easy install or copy files from mod\'s Data folder to your game\'s Data folder
(for Steam it\'s something like C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\)
[b]Don\'t forget to check SnakeBattleaxe.esp in launcher or NMM.[/b]

2. Launch Skyrim and craft Snake Battleaxe. Recipe:
[b]* 6 Iron Ingots
* 1 Quicksilver Ingot
* 1 Deadly Poison[/b]
Also you must have Poisoner perk (Alchemy) to be able to craft an axe and Arcane Blacksmith perk (Smithing) to sharpen it using grindstone.

3. [b]Cannot craft it? Find it![/b] It is located only in one place somewhere in The Reach (there is a screenshot of that place, but no location name)

[img]http://i31.fastpic.ru/big/2012/0212/d8/f79bf8ef9652db1798fd3e57c374f6d8.png[/img]

Axe 3D model and textures are created by Umar Muzammil (http://www.youtube.com/user/umar6419)

[b]My new mod[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12338]Drem Fah Pah Nahl[/url]
author: Mikanoshi
